definition: (of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to

sentences.english: So it had to be carried up to the attic and hung on clotheslines.
sentences.chinese: 因此得把衣服拿上阁楼，挂在晒衣绳上。

sentences.english: The clothes are on Mrs Green's clothes line.
sentences.chinese: 衣服都晾在格林夫人的晒衣绳上。

sentences.english: Look at these clothes. They're on Mrs Green's clothes line.
sentences.chinese: 看这些衣服，它们挂在格林夫人的晒衣绳上。

sentences.english: The wet clothes froze on the clothesline .
sentences.chinese: 湿衣服冻在晒衣绳上了。

sentences.english: She was pegging the clothes out on the line to dry.
sentences.chinese: 她正在把衣服夹在晒衣绳上晾干。

sentences.english: Look at the clothes on Mrs. Green's clothes line.
sentences.chinese: 看格林夫人的晒衣绳上的衣服。

sentences.english: Tammy hung the wet laundry out on the clothesline to dry.
sentences.chinese: 谭米把湿衣服吊在晒衣绳上晾干。

sentences.english: Stick with our gentle friend the clothesline.
sentences.chinese: 坚持使用我们温和的朋友晒衣绳吧。

sentences.english: My school clothes are on the clothes line.
sentences.chinese: 我的校服晒在晒衣绳上。

sentences.english: Martha hung the towel outside on the clothesline in order to cry it out.
sentences.chinese: 马莎把毛巾挂在外面的晒衣绳上晾干。
